description: Try our easy to follow Slow Cooked Beef Burritos recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Slow Cooked Beef Burritos Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: For pan toasted Tortillas: heat a non-stick frying pan over a medium heat and brown each Tortilla for 10 seconds on one side only. Wrap in a tea towel until ready to serve.
